entry.em: ..DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CDT SATURDAY

entry.data:
SUNNY
AREAS OF DENSE FOG THIS MORNING
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
